newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - Dec 13.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS - Issues to watch - Dec 13.

text.p: * Ball Corp said it expects nearly break-even results for the fourth quarter, excluding unusual items. The company previously forecast results for the quarter would be below expectations. Ball shares closed at 25-5/8 Thursday.
* Chiquita Brands International Inc said it would post a fourth quarter charge of $40-$60 million and that earnings before the charge would be below analysts' estimates. Shares closed at 12-7/8.
* Citicorp held unsuccessful talks to acquire American Express Co beginning in November and ending last week, the Wall Street Journal reported, quoting "people familiar with the situation."
The newspaper said Citicorp declined comment on the matter and American Express said it was not involved in talks regarding a sale. Citicorp closed at 98-5/8 and American Express closed at 53-7/8.
